content.rendered:
In “Caillou Chef,” Caillou puts on his apron and takes on the role of a chef in a fun and challenging café. The goal of the game is to help Caillou prepare delicious coffees and pancakes for his customers, effectively managing time to keep everyone happy with the service.
Pancake Preparation: Place batter on the stove, watch the time to avoid burning, and add requested toppings (jam, cream, chocolate).Coffee Service: Serve coffee according to customer orders.Time Management: Manage multiple stoves and coffee makers as difficulty increases. Ensure quick service to keep customer satisfaction high.
